attributes.action: Politicians stop teling people that the majorityn of the Britis public want to stay in the eu without any evidence to back this statement
attributes.additional_details:
We constantly are told by politicians that the majority of the British people want to stay in the eu, lately by the Prime minister, but there has not been a referendum since the mid 70's when the government backed the vote to stay in the common market and refrained from telling the electorate the truth that they were going into a political union.  No vote, no quoting, that we want to be governed by a bunch of unelected political failures called the commission.

Referendum on Europe Now!
